lead_paragraph: If you had a nickel for every time someone in the front office of a pro sports team said "We're not running a charity here," you'd barely have enough to cover the cost of a "Happy Meal."

headline.print_headline: Column: Cowboys Gamble on a Bad Knee Instead of a Bad Actor
headline.main: Column: Cowboys Gamble on a Bad Knee Instead of a Bad Actor

snippet: If you had a nickel for every time someone in the front office of a pro sports team said "We're not running a charity here," you'd barely have enough to cover the cost of a "Happy Meal."...
